name: Gawappamon
description: Gwappamon is a cyborg creature based on the kappa. It has a bluish green body with webbed hands, yellow webbed feet, and on its back is an orange turtle shell. The stomach has a stitched white patch with a bandage on it. Around its neck are headphones and on its face are pink rosy cheeks, yellow bill, and black eyes. On the head, is a CD disc surrounded by orange hair.
